Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hangman

  • public class Hangman
extends Object
    This program is a hangman game. The user can guess a letter or a word from the word to be guessed. There is also a points system in which a user tries to accumulate the most points while trying to guess the word. If the word is guessed the user can play again for another round.
    Author:
    Christian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hangman() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(String[] args)
      The main method executes the whole hangman program
      static void startMenu()
      This method welcome the user and outputs the rules, then this method will ask the user if they want to start the game by entering 1 or quit game by entering 0
      static void wrongGuess0()
      This method outputs to the user the standard hangman image
      static void wrongGuess1()
      This method outputs to the user the face of the hangman image
      static void wrongGuess2()
      This method outputs to the user the face and the body of the hangman image
      static void wrongGuess3()
      This method outputs to the user the face, the body and one of the legs of the hangman
      static void wrongGuess4()
      This method outputs to the user the face, the body and both of the legs of the hangman
      static void wrongGuess5()
      This method outputs to the user the face, the body, both of the legs and one of the arms of the hangman
      static void wrongGuess6()
      This method outputs the full hangman to the user which consists the face, the body, both of the legs and both of the arms of the hangman

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
